and gestational diabetes. At the end 
of your booking appointment, you 
should understand the plan of care 
for your pregnancy and have your 
hand-held notes to carry with you at 
all times. Your booking appointment 
is an opportunity to tell your midwife 
or doctor if you are in a vulnerable 
situation or if you need extra 
support. This could be because of 
domestic violence, sexual abuse or 
female genital mutilation.
